title: ‘It’s So Hard to Race Against the Super Teams:’ Simon Yates Targeting Podium in Tour de France Rematch
content:
Jayco-AlUla star on racing as an underdog: 'I am still hungry to do more, to improve, and to do better.'

Read the full article at ‘It’s So Hard to Race Against the Super Teams:’ Simon Yates Targeting Podium in Tour de France Rematch on Velo.
author: ahood
